patchNotes.title: Talent rework

texts.text: Gazlowe basic attack speed is reduced by 66%.
Gazlowe basic attack is now a triple-hit attack.

general.developerCommentary: This is the change that helps Auto attack Gazlowe, he doesn't have any gap closer he shouldn't be forced on melee range all the time for making it efficient.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Right now Gazlowe is a mix of a mage and an Auto Attacker where he doesn't shine in both roles. His auto attack build ain't complete enough and the mage build centers on comboing his ultimate. What i want to accomplish here is to make his kit more play-creative while giving a boost to the auto attack build and i want to do that by boosting his roleplay fantasy while increasing the skill ceiling(not the skill floor)

changes.name: New: MOLL-E Blingtron 5000 Gift(Active)

texts.text: Activate to put a Mailbox that will give a random item after 30 seconds. The item disappears after 60 seconds if not picked up and after 60 seconds if not used. Any hero can get the items (Cooldown 20 seconds):
subtexts: Invisibility Field - Grants invisibility in target area for 10 seconds.
Hyperspeed Accelerators - Grants speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
Grounded Plasma Shield - Grants 200 shield for 3 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: This is made thinking on improve gazlowe utility as a 4-man hero rather than a solo laner granting him more of gadget power to his side.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  1, 2>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: As a competitor to <vanilla, talents,  1, 1> this talent serves less purposes for the auto attack build as putting more turrets it's both more beneficial and cooler for Gazlowe than just hitting harder

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  1, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Destroying a turret with <modified, abilities,  trait, 0> gives Gazlowe 15% movement speed for 2 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: The auto attack is a build more focused on solo laners and it requires Gazlowe to hit heroes. The problem with that relies on Gazlowe's methods to reach enemies or crowd control them. His <modified, abilities, basic, 2> is hard to hit, and the movement speed on basic attacks comes only on level 16, with no mobility, he has hard times going for the enemies. The only reliable source for him to for the auto attacks safely and early is the slow he gets when hitting with <vanilla, talents,  7, 2>. So the objective here is to bring up the tools for him to go for this auto attack build faster by making a synergy with the extra scrap and making it a more high skill ceiling talent.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  4, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Destroying a turret with <modified, abilities,  trait, 0> reduces nearby enemy heroes' damage by 20% and increases allied heroes' armor by 10 for 4 seconds. Gazlowe will receive a shield that absorbs 100 damage for each hero affected for 2.5 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents,  4, 2> and <vanilla, talents,  4, 0> kindas fight for the same spot of utility, one being more turret focused and the other being a more eazy to pick talent but it kinda undermines build variety with 2 talents covering the same topic. For that instance both talents also works in a way too simple that >IN MY OPINION< could be more valued in a higher skill ceiling talent that also doesn't too complex. The objective here is to make that talent viable both as a 4-man and a solo laner while showing that skill expression that i talked about as the enemy hero damage reduction would work better in 1v1's and the armor would work better when close to your team.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  4, 0>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: I mixed this talent with <vanilla, talents,  4, 2>

changes.name: New: Mekgineer's Mount 5000

texts.text: Gazlowe's mount lets another hero mount together on a mining cart installed by Gazlowe. The allied hero will mount instantly on Gazlowe's cart without resetting their own mount cooldown
subtexts: Nitro Boosts (Active): Activate to make Gazlowe become unstoppable for 5 seconds. He can't be unmounted by damage while mounted and his mount speed increases to 150%. The effect is lost if Gazlowe dismounts (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

changes.developerCommentary: Gazlowe is a tinker but isn't building much.Roleplay fantasy is a must and clip moments of Gazlowe saving teammates would be damn popular, i am only uncertain if should be added an effect that prevents Gazlowe being unmounted if he takes damage lower than 2% of his health as that talent could alredy be fairly strong on rotations

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  4, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Heroes hit with <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> are affected by Zap for 3 seconds, dealing 40 damage per second to enemy heroes close to them. Hitting the same enemy hero with <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> and <modified, abilities, basic, 2> within 3 seconds makes Gazlowe zap all his <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> to deal damage to the enemies. Gazlowe is healed for 100% of all Zap damage

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents,  4, 1> original effects serves his purpose for the mage talent build BUT it's not only about serving the purpose that makes HOTS talents cool but also how they affect your gameplay, straight number buffs are not necessarily game changers and I FELT that on this. The changes here are made to make the original purpose stay..damage+healing on the <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> but also adding more interactions and effects that would make the player play potential increase

changes.name: New: Cardboard Assassin(active)

texts.text: Activate to place a Cardboard Assassin decoy unit that have 1000 health and act as a heroic unit for 10 seconds.

If you hit Cardboard Assassin with <modified, abilities,  basic, 1>, it becomes Zapped and deals 40 damage per second and heals 100% of the damage to enemy heroes and taunts them for 0.5 seconds. After 3 seconds, it explodes and get destroyed. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)
Passive: <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: CardBoard Assassin is made with the intention to increase the skill expression of gazlowe while also mainting the roleplay of builder fantasy

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  7, 1>

texts.text: Moved to level 13

changes.developerCommentary: With the new Cardboard Assassin <vanilla, talents,  7, 1> would start to be undervalued

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0>

texts.text: Basic attacks stack now deal 60 damage over 5 seconds, but stack up to 9 times.
Additional functionality:  <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> now explode dealing 135 damage to enemies when they are destroyed
additional functionality: Increase max scrap limit by 6 and increase scrap regeneration speed by 50%

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0> ain't a big game changer compared to Grav-o-Bomb for your build to be picked and not effective as much BUT with the additional power the talents i created/modified i believe that making it have a increased synergy with <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> would make it A GAME CHANGER for some builds.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  13, 2>

texts.text: Removed

changes.developerCommentary: Increase the ability damage is part of the <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> effect and further increasing it's spell power on a counter intuitive way of auto attacking ain't the best solution for my gameplay vision. I understand that this talent was made for mage players to value more their turrets but there are another ways that i would prefer to

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  7, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> can now be recast during its channeling up to three times. Each recast will increase the channel time by 0.65 seconds, the area by 100% of its base area, and the damage by 75% of the base damage
moved from level 7

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents,  7, 1> on level 13 is an option to replace <vanilla, talents,  13, 2> while also making Gazlowe more prone to creative plays. The ideia of increasing <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> casting better suit what i envision of player control instead of the original effect of non-stop reseting.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  13, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> by 0.75 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: I always felt that this talent effects belongs to an AA build as it rewards more the Gazlowe players that risk themselves more for the basic attacks

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  16, 2>

texts.text: Movement speed bonus is now stacking

changes.developerCommentary: I just want to note that the movement speed you get from <modified, talents,  1, 1> needs to stack with that talent granting an effective 30% movespeed bonus if used correctly

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  16, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality:  <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> every 5 seconds will charge a lazor making it next shoot deal 125 damage
(Active) L-A-Z-O-R: The next time you cast a <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> will make all your <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> shoot a lazor(30 seconds cooldown)

changes.developerCommentary: Changing <vanilla, talents,  16, 0> to be more consistent and reliable

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  20, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 5 for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 45.

Goblin missile(active) - Goblin Missile (Active) - Deploy a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing 300 damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target. (Cooldown: 60 seconds)

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents,  20, 0> doesn't encourages basic attacks build enough neither it can compete with <vanilla, talents,  20, 2> on the build, so, you don't need to try to compete with it. Gazlowe as a tinkerer should have a happy time as a builder. For instance i don't even mine it being a copy cat of Gyrocopter homing missile because it suits SO WELL gazlowe
